review_text: Almost works like it is supposed to. The finger holes are a little small and hard to release the cup if you use all 4 holes. Just use the top two  and the large hole with three fingers and it works great. Good Quality. I would Recommend this item. Great Price and fast shipping.
product_name: Design Fist Cup Brass Knuckle Duster Handle Coffee Milk Ceramic Fist Mug Cup Cool Gift
